17.3: With whom does the Mishnah accord? It is R. Judah, as it is taught The first-born of a donkey is prohibited in benefit. But R. Shimon permits.
17.18: Rabbah said: R. Shimon agrees that after its neck is broken it is prohibited to derive benefit from it.
17.19: What is his reasoning? He derives "breaking its neck" from "breaking its neck" connected to the heifer whose neck is broken.
